articles.title: NFL fining Patriots quarterback Mac Jones again - AL.com
articles.description: The former Alabama All-American must pay for a low block during Saturday’s game, report says.
articles.content:
For the second time this month, the NFL is fining New England Patriots quarterback Mac Jones for actions that didnt draw a penalty during the game.

articles.title: FBI warns about 'pig butchering' crypto scam sweeping America - Newshub
articles.description: The FBI says America has a "pig butchering" problem.
articles.content:
The term pig butchering refers to an unsuspecting victim -- the "pig" -- being tricked by scammers into forking over money for a promised high rate of return.
